entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Pack of .NET 5 RazorClassLibrary is broken when .NET 6 Preview 7 is installed #35568
    question, area-blazor, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, feature-static-web-assets
  • `{Date, Time}Only` Querystring building APIs for Blazor #35567
    Working, enhancement, area-blazor, api-ready-for-review, 6.0-rc2
  • Remove continueOnBuildError for components e2e #35565
    test-failure, area-blazor
  • Improve console output of "dotnet watch" to make it clearer #35562
    area-commandlinetools, feature-dotnetwatch
  • hotreload breaks blazor webassembly with asp and user defined base path - missing blazor-hotreload.js returns 404 #35555
    Author: Migration Bot :robot:
  • Autogenerated code can't compile in VS preview version. #35554
    Author: Migration Bot :robot:
  • Set asp-append-version to true for everything #35553
    area-mvc, feature-mvc-razor-views
  • Support Blazor properly for All ASP.Net Identity Scaffolded pages (i.e., not Razor Pages) #35551
    area-blazor
  • .Net 6 p7 Wasm publised throws Blazor detected a change in the application's culture that is not supported with the current project configuration #35550
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] IntelliSense does not work for grand-child components. #35549
    area-razor.tooling
  • #region in @code doesn't collapse #35548
    bug, area-razor.tooling, Razor.Tooling
  • Package Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.EntityFrameworkCore 5.0.0 is not compatible with net50 (.NETFramework,Version=v5.0). Package Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.EntityFrameworkCore 5.0.0 supports: netstandard2.1 (.NETStandard,Version=v2.1) #35552
    area-dataprotection
  • W3CLog ends up in the wrong file at the end of the day #35546
    area-runtime
  • Add BatchSize to W3CLoggerOptions #35545
    api-suggestion
  • [SignalR] Provide a way for Azure SignalR to read HttpConnectionDispatcherOptions #35544
    area-signalr
  • Autorebuild & refresh browser doesn't work for F# projects #35543
    area-mvc, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, feature-hot-reload
  • Disposing InputFile BrowserFileStream does not dispose JSStreamReference #35540
    area-blazor

Closed

  • NET 6 RC1 Ask Mode - All PRs #35488
    area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1
  • [.Net 6.0 Preview 7] Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Razor.StaticWebAssets.targets DirectoryNotFoundException #35561
    Done, area-mvc, Author: Migration Bot :robot:, feature-static-web-assets
  • Blazor WebAssembly App does not build when referencing .NET Standard 2.0 assembly. #35349
    bug, Done, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, Author: Migration Bot :robot:, 6.0-rc1
  • Blazor WebAssembly AOT publiish output contains files that should not be published #32744
    bug, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, feature-blazor-aot-compilation, 6.0-rc2
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Razor GeneratePackageOnBuild creating folders for random static web assets #29561
    bug, investigate, area-blazor, feature-static-web-assets, affected-few, severity-major, 6.0-rc2
  • LSP platform can flood Razor tooling with semantic token requests. #35396
    Done, Perf, area-razor.tooling, 17.0-Preview4
  • Unannotated parameters in disabled nullability context should be treated as optional #35507
    bug, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1
  • New Use middleware overload, can cause compiler errors if you don't call next #32020
    feature-HttpAbstractions, breaking-change, area-runtime, Discussions
  • Blazor WebAssembly prerendering application with Globalization and Localization #33485
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, feature-prerendering, Discussions
  • HttpSys RequestAborted is not correct if created after the disconnect #17278
    bug, area-runtime, servers-httpsys, severity-nice-to-have, affected-very-few, 6.0-rc2
  • Add version to css of nuget package when load page #35333
    :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, area-razor.compiler
  • Let AddSpaStaticFiles be configured with multiple localized spa apps. #35485
    question, area-mvc, feature-spa, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved
  • How to access the component instance in the Blazor Xunit test case? #35500
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved
  • Throw when unsupported HTTPS options are set for HTTP/3 #34739
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel, HTTP3, 6.0-rc2
  • Figure out ToolName in DotNetToolTask & BrotliCompressTask #25795
    task, investigate, area-mvc, feature-static-web-assets, severity-nice-to-have, affected-all, Backlog
  • StaticWebAssetsFileProvider.cs System.NotImplementedException when using app.UseDirectoryBrowser() #18416
    bug, Done, area-mvc, feature-static-web-assets, severity-minor, affected-very-few, 6.0-rc1
  • error MSB4186: Invalid static method invocation syntax: #31770
    Done, area-blazor, feature-static-web-assets, 6.0-rc1
  • [Blazor server] 404 on .properties file #25312
    bug, question, area-blazor, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, feature-static-web-assets, affected-few, severity-major, blazor-server, Backlog
  • ResolveStaticWebAssetsInputs breaks --no-build #21979
    bug, Done, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, feature-static-web-assets, affected-few, severity-minor, 6.0-rc1
  • Resolve issue with Publish_NoBuild_CopiesStaticWebAssetsToDestinationFolder test #29224
    Done, test-failure, area-mvc, feature-static-web-assets, 6.0-rc1
  • SWA URLs reflect PackageId, not project name #26055
    task, Docs, area-blazor, feature-static-web-assets, affected-few, severity-minor, Backlog
  • Test Failure: Publish_WithBuildReferencesDisabled_CopiesStaticWebAssetsToDestinationFolder #22333
    task, test-failure, area-mvc, feature-static-web-assets, affected-few, severity-minor, Backlog
  • Rationalize BlazorILLink incrementalism in hosted+VS+RID+publishing case #20413
    bug, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, feature-static-web-assets, affected-few, severity-minor, feature-pwa, 6.0-rc1
  • Support linked files for static web assets coming from libraries #10402
    bug, Done, area-blazor, feature-static-web-assets, affected-few, severity-minor, 6.0-rc1
  • Blazor WebAssembly: Hot reload does not do any UI changes on macOS 11.7 (Apple M1) - .NET 6.0 Preview 7 #35524
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, feature-hot-reload
  • VSCode: CodeLens references numbers cannot be loaded if re-open the project #35493
    area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs
  • IOExceptions caused by client disconnects are noisy on HttpSysServer #35490
    area-runtime, servers-httpsys, 6.0-rc1
  • Minimal API query & route parameter mapping to an object #35304
    design-proposal, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks

Updated

  • VS is slow to start making requests of Language Servers #31416
    External, investigate, blocked, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs, feature-razor.textmate, 17.0-Preview4
  • Support asp-items for datalist element #7663
    help wanted, enhancement, area-mvc, severity-minor, affected-medium, feature-mvc-razor-views, .NET 7-Candidate
  • Adding a new Razor component does not get picked up as a valid component until edit #33957
    bug, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs, 17.0-Preview4
  • Allow external libraries to extend Results #35508
    api-ready-for-review, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1
  • Database Distributed Cache #35220
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-runtime, api-suggestion, Status: No Recent Activity, feature-caching
  • Minimal APIs naming cleanup #35478
    area-runtime, api-ready-for-review, feature-minimal-actions, 6.0-rc1
  • Upgrading default Blazor template from 5.0 to 6.0 preview 7 causes fallback endpoint _Host not being found. #35403
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-blazor
  • Support DateOnly and TimeOnly as parsing options for [SupplyParameterFromQuery] #35525
    Working, enhancement, area-blazor, feature-blazor-builtin-components, 6.0-rc2
  • Analyzers for Minimal APIs #35528
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Circular dependency error when publishing webdeploy package using .net 5.0.300 #35134
    External
  • Blazor Web Assembly hot reload is very unstable #35352
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-commandlinetools, Status: No Recent Activity, Status: Resolved, feature-dotnetwatch, feature-hot-reload
  • View not found running on .Net6 rc1 #35452
    area-mvc, Needs: Attention :wave:, 6.0-rc2
  • Extend the ability to customize parameter binding for Minimal APIs #35489
    api-suggestion, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, .NET 7-Candidate
  • Add support for using endpoint metadata to add tags to an endpoint for use in OpenAPI descriptions #35310
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Flaky test: RendersAuthorizingUntilAuthorizationCompletedAsync #31854
    test-failure, area-blazor, 6.0.0
  • Fix minimal APIs behavior with duplicate endpoint and route names #35436
    bug, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • InvariantGlobalization 6.0 bug when component have EditForm #35324
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, Status: No Recent Activity, feature-hot-reload
  • Subclassing Startup from StartupBase throws NotSupportedException #35502
    Docs, area-runtime, feature-hosting
  • Publish nightly builds to an LKG location #35457
    area-infrastructure, .NET 7-Candidate
  • Create ConsumesRequestTypeAttribute for Minimal API endpoints #35421
    api-suggestion, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • asp.netcore cpu throttle in k8s cluster #29150
    area-runtime, Needs: Attention :wave:, Next sprint planning
  • InvokeVoidAsync shouldn't serialize return value to .NET #16632
    bug, area-blazor, affected-few, severity-minor, feature-blazor-jsinterop, 6.0-rc2
  • [Https] `dotnet dev-certs --trust` support on Linux #32842
    enhancement, area-commandlinetools, feature-devcerts, Next sprint planning
  • .Net 6 Preview 7 sdk is adversely affecting npm commands #35541
    question, area-blazor, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, feature-razor-sdk
  • Support custom error messages for optionality via nullability feature #35501
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Blazor Hosted - Pass model to Server with NavigationManager #35530
    area-blazor
  • Publishing on GitHub breaks with .Net 6 preview7 sdk #35274
    Docs, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, feature-static-web-assets, 6.0.0
  • Part2 - Improve error messages for implicit and explicit FromBody attribute in Minimal API #35405
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc2
  • Kestrel reset error when no reset received #34768
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel, HTTP2, 6.0-rc1
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Polly TaskCancelledException during retry when deadline is hit. #28383
    bug, area-runtime, feature-httpclientfactory, area-grpc, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, Next sprint planning
  • Host grpc service in iis or as an app service? #9020
    area-grpc, Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0-rc1] Minimal APIs naming cleanup #35576
  • Don't cache CanReuse value #35575
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Add support for Results extension point #35574
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore dotnet/runtime #35573
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Complain when returning IActionResult from MinimalAction #35572
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for Results extension point #35571
    area-runtime
  • Minimal APIs naming cleanup #35570
    area-runtime
  • Add Support for `DateOnly` & `TimeOnly` for `SupplyParameterFromQuery` #35569
    area-blazor
  • [release/6.0] Cancel the token when it's created after an Abort/Disconnect #35566
    area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • [Static web assets] Fix casing issues during parsing #35564
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #35556
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35547
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Fix SignalR TS unit test that was hitting the network #35557
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore dotnet/runtime #35558
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc1
  • Update README Roadmap Link #35560
    7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Binding support for 'bool' values with InputRadioGroup and InputSelect #35523
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0-rc1
  • Treat reference type parameters in oblivious nullability context as optional (#35526) #35563
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] HTTP/3: Fix incorrectly pooling aborted streams #35441
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, ask-mode, 6.0-rc1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] HTTP/3: Use new QuicStream.ReadsCompleted property in transport #35483
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, ask-mode, 6.0-rc1
  • Cancel the token when it's created after an Abort/Disconnect #35418
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Paint it green #35559
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Treat reference type parameters in oblivious nullability context as optional #35526
    Servicing-approved, ask-mode, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1
  • Added support for type based parameter binding (#35496) #35535
    Servicing-approved, feature-minimal-actions, 6.0-rc1
  • Throw when unsupported HTTPS options are set for HTTP/3 #35532
    area-runtime, HTTP3, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Set HttpSys read error log levels to debug #35542
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, ask-mode, 6.0-rc1
  • Merge internal commits for 2.1.30 #35534
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Throw when unsupported HTTPS options are set for HTTP/3 #35533
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0-rc2
  • Set EndpointName and DisplayName given method name in endpoints (#35439) #35527
    7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35513
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #35522
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Set HttpSys read error log levels to debug #35537
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • HTTP/3: Use new QuicStream.ReadsCompleted property in transport #35482
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Improve Minimal APIs support for request media types #35082 #35230
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0-rc1] HTTP/3: Response drain timeout #35492
    area-runtime, ask-mode, 6.0-rc1
  • Tweak readme for Identity server #35416
    area-mvc
  • Identity UI Bootstrap 5.1 tweaks #35467
    area-identity
  • RC1 Port: Add FailureReasons (#35425) #35529
    area-security, ask-mode
  • Update RazorPage template to be able to be SxS with previous version #34598
    area-mvc
  • Support generic value tuple parameters in components #34737
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Release object URL after image for resize has loaded #35499
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Reliability improvement for input date E2E tests #35505
    area-blazor, 6.0-rc1
  • Update middleware that assumes UseRouting is called after them, for minimal hosting #35426
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
